original_title: Unknown group set fire to house during birthday: One killed, 9 injured
original_body_lines: A 21 year old girl was killed and nine others including children were injured and hospitalised after a group of unidentified men set fire to a house at Thonikkal in Vavuniya early this morning while a birthday party was in progress.
Vavuniya police launched investigations based on a message received through the 119 emergency.
Police, together with the Vavuniya Municipal Council Fire Department and local residents extinguished the fire.
They said a 21-year old woman died and nine others injured were taken to the Vavuniya General Hospital.
A 02-year-old boy, two girls aged 07 and 13, four women between the ages of 19 and 41 years, a 42-year-old man and a 36-year-old were injured in the fire.
Investigations revealed that a group of masked persons had come and set fire to the house while the owner was holding a party for the daughter's birthday.(DSB)
